content.body: It existed before Bikeshed IIRC, so I think a good portion of it is inertia via copy-paste or people within a working group encouraging you to do the same as the rest of the working group's specs. But, I suspect it would have died out, except for Marcos Caceres's evangelism and maintenance (e.g. converting specs to ReSpec).
So what happens now Agent Smith?
Yall are literally bout to feel it. No vaseline. Big Celly Dicks. Lol
We can be civil or very disrespectful. Lets talk like mature adults. For real.
